p: One-way or two-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) with Dunnett’s posttest was used to test for statistical significance. Only p values of 0.05 or lower were considered statistically significant ( p > 0.05 [ns, not significant], p ≤ 0.05 [*], p ≤ 0.01 [**], p ≤ 0.001 [***]). For all statistical analyses, the GraphPad Prism 7 software package was used (GraphPad Software).
